a.detail: Several square holes are cut into the walls here
a.summary: Several square holes are cut into the walls here

c.detail: A fountain of water sits in an alcove here
c.summary: A fountain of water sits in an alcove here

details.history: The dungeon was created by a lawful evil barbarian as a treasure vault. Its creator was destroyed by attacking raiders, and the dungeon has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.
details.temperature:
Severe Cold (DC 15 Constitution save each hour
    or gain one level of exhaustion)

detail.room_features: A stone ramp ascends towards the north wall, and spirals of black stones cover the floor

north.desc: Trapped Bone Portcullis (DC 20 to lift, DC 20 to break; 30 hp)
north.trap:
Rune of Fear: DC 20 to find, DC 20 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 15 save or become frightened for 1d4 rounds

north.desc: Stuck Iron Door (DC 25 to break; 60 hp) (slides to one side)

south.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Unlocked Iron Door (60 hp)
south.secret: A bookcase and concealed door pivots smoothly

west.desc: Trapped and Unlocked Bone Door (20 hp)
west.trap:
Falling Block: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 13 save or take 18d10 damage

monster: 4 x Fire Giant (cr 9, mm 154); easy, 20000 xp
Treasure: 230 sp, 100 gp; 180 gp; 280 sp, 70 gp; 1800 cp, 20 ep
detail.room_features: A mural of ancient mythology covers the ceiling, and a pair of dice lies in the north-west corner of the room

north.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Unlocked Iron Door (60 hp)
north.secret: A bookcase and concealed door pivots smoothly

south.desc: Stuck Bone Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

detail.room_features: A tile mosaic of vile acts covers the floor, and several iron cages are scattered throughout the room

east.desc: Stuck Bone Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

detail.room_features: A chute descends from the room into a natural cavern below, and a set of demonic war masks hangs on the south wall

detail.room_features: The floor is covered with humanoid bones, and several pieces of rotten bread are scattered throughout the room

settings.name: The Lost Dungeon of the Demon Baron

wandering_monsters.1: 14 x Succubus (cr 4, mm 285); medium, 15400 xp; hunting the wizard who summoned it
wandering_monsters.2: 13 x Bearded Devil (cr 3, mm 70); easy, 9100 xp; dragging an unconscious paladin knight
wandering_monsters.3: Chain Devil (cr 8, mm 72) and 12 x Bearded Devil (cr 3, mm 70); easy, 12300 xp; hunting a rival
wandering_monsters.4: Fire Giant Dreadnought (cr 14, motm 124, vgm 147) and 3 x Fire Giant (cr 9, mm 154); medium, 26500 xp; pulling a small cart of iron bars and other trade goods
wandering_monsters.5: 15 x Hell Hound (cr 3, mm 182); easy, 10500 xp; hunting the wizard who summoned it
wandering_monsters.6: 11 x Black Abishai (cr 7, motm 38, mtf 160); deadly, 31900 xp; scouting from another part of the dungeon
